title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.20 - Ground support equipment required to display lights
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.20 - Ground support equipment required to display lights

State Regulations

All ground support equipment shall display lights from
one-half hour after sunset to one-half hour before sunrise, and at all other
times when there is not sufficient light to render clearly discernible persons
and vehicles at a distance of 500 feet, except when such vehicles are parked in
areas designated by the manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
